page.title: 13VILLAGE MAYFAYRE - PITSFORD
page.content: TRADITIONAL MAYTIME FESTIVITIES ARE STILL HELD DURING THE EARLY PART OF MAY IN THIS VILLAGE. MOST OF THE PLANNING FOR THIS ANNUAL EVENT IS UNDERTAKEN BY A MAYFAYRE COMMITTEE WHICH MEETS REGULARLY THROUGHOUT THE YEAR - STARTING IN THE MONTH OF JUNE. UNLIKE MANY VILLAGE FESTIVALS WHICH TAKE PLACE ON A SINGLE SITE, THE MAYFAYRE TAKES OVER THE WHOLE VILLAGE ON THE APPROPRIATE WEEKEND WITH SUCH EVENTS AS FIVE-A-SIDE FOOTBALL ON THE PLAYING FIELD,DOG SHOWS IN THE CONVENT GROUNDS,REFRESHMENTS IN THE VILLAGE HALL, ORGAN AND HAND BELL RECITALS IN THE CHURCH, AND NUMEROUS SIDESHOWS, COMPETITIONS AND CRAFT DISPLAYS ALONG THE LANES,IN GARDENS AND ON THE GREEN. MANY OF THE OLD HOUSES, THE BAKERY, FORGE AND POTTERY ALSO OPEN THEIR DOORS. A HOT AIR BALLOON IS LAUNCHED.
